name: 4 Wheel Thunder
summary: 4 Wheel Thunder is a racing game developed by Kalisto Entertainment and published by Midway Games. While the game had been in development for some time prior as a separate title, it was eventually decided to rebrand the game into Midway's Thunder series.

name: 4 Wheel Drive
summary:
4 Wheel Drive is a compilation featuring the following 4 racing games:

Combo Racer
Lotus Esprit Turbo Challenge
Team Suzuki
Toyota Celica GT Rally

name: 4-Wheel City Drifting
summary:
Race the car in the city track on this night

Drifting and speeding is the only way to win.

Defeat those opponents and become the legend of the city!

name: 4 Witch Seasons & Convenant
summary: 刚刚从孤儿院离开的少年遇到了自己亲生父亲的女儿，被要求前往她所在的城市的大学。少年进入了探索都市传说的社团，当在快乐的探索世界的大学生活之中度过的时候，城市之中释放出的吞噬一切的怪物出现在了他的面前，如同神明一样的神秘少女拯救。

name: 4 Wheel Drive
summary: A version of Jeep Jamboree: Off Road Adventure without the Jeep brand license.

name: 4 Wheel Madness
summary: Get in Bigfoot's driver seat. Can you make it across the finish line with more than just four huge wheels?

name: 4Wheel Challenge
summary: A challenging 3D platformer where you control a wheelchair-bound character to overcome dynamic obstacles, jump between platforms, and test your skills in action-packed levels. Fail and go back to the previous level to try again!
